titles: The spirituall vvatch, or Christs generall watch-word A meditation on Mark. 13. 37. By Thomas Gataker B. of D. and pastor of Rotherhith.
author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for William Bladen, and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible, at the great north dore of Paules,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.
